mirayiridzo set: Kuunganidzwa kwemirairo iyo CPU inogona kunzwisisa
rejista: Diki, super-inokurumidza ndangariro nzvimbo mukati meCPU
verenga ndangariro chete: Zvitoro mirairo iyo yakakosha kuti komputa itange
cache memory: Idiki, inokurumidza ndangariro padyo neCPU kuti uwane nekukurumidza
saizi yeshoko: Huwandu hwemabhiti CPU inogona kugadzirisa kamwechete
pipeline: Tekinoroji uko CPU inotyora mirairo kuita nhanho kushanda pane akawanda kamwechete
multiprocessing: Kushandisa akawanda maCPU kana macores kuita mabasa panguva imwe chete
virtual memory: Tekiniki yekushandisa hard disk nzvimbo sekuwedzera kwe RAM
bios: Basic Input/Output System, firmware inotangisa Hardware pakutanga
i/o chiteshi: Kero chaiyo pakombuta yekutaurirana nemidziyo yekunze
mudziyo mutyairi: Software inobvumira iyo inoshanda sisitimu kudzora mudziyo
network protocol: Seti yemitemo uye zviyero zvekutaurirana pakati pemidziyo
packet: Chikamu chidiki che data chinofambiswa pane network
router: Chishandiso chinoendesa mberi mapaketi pakati pemanetiweki akasiyana
subnet mask: Inoshandiswa kuona network uye kutambira zvikamu zve IP kero
topology: Kurongeka kwemidziyo uye zvinongedzo mune network
mutengi server modhi: Network architecture uko vatengi vanokumbira zviwanikwa kubva kumaseva
dma: Yakananga ndangariro kuwana, inobvumira zvishandiso kutamisa data pasina kushandisa iyo CPU
